transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, actually what happened is that the mobile was silent, so I couldn't pick it up, and I was checking the video.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: So, are you able to see the things?
Customer: Ha, ye hota nahi hai isme karne se.
Executive: Isme karne se nahi ho raha hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: So, I'm sending you the image, and after that, the window that will come, I'm sending it to you.
Executive: Okay, what will you see from the first one you sent?
Executive: After that, you have to click here.
Customer: Ha, aapka hi abhi aaya.
Executive: Ha, sahi hai, ekdum sahi jagah pe hai aap.
Executive: Iske baad share screen pe click karenge na aap?
Executive: Toh aapko ye aapko option milega.
Executive: Ye screen aayegi aapke samne.
Executive: Theek hai, jisme aapko right side me upar ek likha hai entire screen.
Executive: Theek hai, entire screen pe click.
Customer: Aisa nahi aa raha hai, aisa aa raha hai, ye kya likha hai dekho.
Executive: Ha, dikhana ek baar kaisa aa raha hai screen.

Customer: Accha ye aa raha hai, ye kya likha hai?
Customer: Select window or screen, ispe click kare, select window or screen pe kya aa raha hai?
Customer: Hmm?
Customer: Window, dekha hai na upar?
Customer: Select window or screen.
Customer: Entire entire screen bolke aa raha hai.
Executive: Ha, entire screen pe click kariye.
Executive: Uske baad ek chhoti si screen aayegi jo uske neeche hi.
Customer: Uspe click karenge.
Executive: Mini screen, chhoti si screen aa rahi hogi aapke paas.
Customer: Oh my screen anyway.
Executive: Ji ha, aa gayi. Aa gaya.
Customer: Kya aa gaya?
Executive: Screen aapki ab mujhe dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Aur ab isme new tab open kare sir, control T daba kar.
Executive: Control T.
Customer: T?
Executive: Ha.
Customer: B na T?
Executive: Ha, sahi hai, sahi jagah pe aa gaye aap. Yaha pe seller panel apna open kariye.
Customer: Control T bol raha hai na, T for pen na?
Executive: Nahi nahi, ab kuch nahi karna hai aapko.
Executive: Ab screen aapki share hogi, aap waha pe pahunch gaye, ek new tab open kariye, tab, naya tab open karne ko bol raha hu.
Customer: Naya wala?
Executive: Ha, naya tab.
Executive: Click Chrome pe. Ha ha, bilkul Chrome pe aayega aapko kisi bhi.
Executive: Accha ek kaam karta hu sir mai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Pehle mai mai screen share karke dikhau kya aapko, jaise matlab thoda sa aapko idea ho jayega kaise karna chahiye.
Customer: Ha bolo.
Executive: Indiamart dalo, Indiamart dalo kya?
Customer: Ha, seller.indiamart.com.
Customer: Hamara.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Aur ye nahi hai website.
Executive: Indiamart.com pe hai ye, sahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Pehle kabhi aapne number hai 78 wala, ek 787 wala wala daliye.
Customer: Ha?
Executive: 787 wala number hai na aapka? Ha, jisse ha, wo wala number se login kijiye.
Executive: Abhi to login hai aapka ye sir, theek hai, acchi baat hai. Ha.
Executive: Toh seedha hum kaam ki baat karte hai na, toh product karne ke liye click kijiye.

Executive: Network issue toh nahi hai sir?
Customer: Thoda issue hai sir.
Executive: Rukiye mai bahar jaata hu isko leke. Accha accha, nahi nahi, matlab refresh nahi hota na pehle aapka, thoda andar andar aaya tha.
Customer: Hmm, theek hai, abhi aa jayega, bahar aa jayega.
Customer: Andar network aata nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi koi dikkat nahi sir. Kabhi chalta hai kabhi nahi chalta hai, aajkal weather ki wajah se kahi jagah network ka issue chal raha hai. Toh inko mai samajh sakta hu bilkul aapki. Kai baar mere saath bhi aisa hi hota hai.
Customer: Kya hai abhi?
Executive: Refresh kar dijiye, page ko refresh kar dijiye.



Executive: Accha accha, login ka issue aa gaya, theek hai, login ek baar fir wohi number daal ke aati hai na.

Customer: Oh net net bhi aa raha hai, mai band phone band kar raha hu aapka.
Executive: Accha phone dusre OTP dusre number pe aayega sir. Ab aap kariye aap, do minute me kariye.
Customer: Aah, theek hai. Kar raha hu kar, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to login to seller panel.

- Facing difficulty in screen sharing process.

- Network issue.



Resolution:

- Executive guided the customer on screen sharing.

- Executive guided to login with 787 number.

- Executive acknowledged network issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try logging in again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, screen sharing, network, seller panel
